column1: [Hornets] OFFICIAL: We have acquired Wes Iwundu and a protected 2022 first-round pick in a three-team sign-and-trade.

Addition Details of MEM/NOP/CHA Trade: Pelicans generate $17M trade exception (Adams' outgoing salary). Wes Iwundu to Charlotte. The protected 2022 first-round pick the Hornets acquired from New Orleans will convey to two second-rounders if the Pelicans wind up in the lottery.
[Charania] The Hornets are waiving Wes Iwundu to finalize their roster, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
